#summary The lastest news on the project

= Latest News =
===  07.12.2009 Release 1.4.0 ===
Updated to these GTK+ 2.18 changes:
  * Backup files are hidden by default
  * GTK+ remembers the sorting state of the file list
  * File sizes are shown by default
  * No icon more for some buttons
  * When new devices are mounted (/media folder) or the bookmark changed or files modified in the current dir, the file chooser is "live" updated.

[http://gtkjfilechooser.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/GtkJFileChooser/site/img/gtk+2.18.0.png]

Tested on the following platforms:
  * Ubuntu 9.10
  * OpenSuse 11.2
  * OpenSolaris 2009.06

=== 11.10.2009 Added test app ===
To launch the demo application, whose purpose is mainly for testing, double click on gtkjfilechooser-demo.jar or type from the command line "java -jar gtkjfilechooser-demo.jar":

[http://gtkjfilechooser.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/GtkJFileChooser/site/img/FileChooserDemo.png]

The demo is completly based on the Sun Java FileChooserDemo in $JAVA_HOME/demo/jfc/FileChooserDemo.
